comment: The canonical bijection from ` ( RR X. RR ) ` to ` CC ` described in ~ cnref1o is in fact a homeomorphism of the usual topologies on these sets. (It is also an isometry, if ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is metrized with the l<SUP>2</SUP> norm.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
